mapper.update: update evaluate set waybill_no = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kdy_id = #{kdyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kdy_name = #{kdyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kh_name = #{khName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch = #{branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_content = #{pContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_content = #{tContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where e_id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select e_id, waybill_no, kdy_id, kdy_name, kh_name, branch, p_content, t_content from evaluate

select count(*) from evaluate
waybill_no like concat('%',#{waybillNo},'%')

select e_id, waybill_no, kdy_id, kdy_name, kh_name, branch, p_content, t_content from evaluate
waybill_no like concat('%',#{waybillNo},'%')
